segments.text: This house is not looking all that great from here
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ’ t really tell everything about a house from the outside . Let ’ s go inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think that it is looking any better inside here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that fresh paint and cleaning would help it look a little better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is just too dark in here with so few windows .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear that the kitchen is quite large . Let ’ s go check it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The kitchen may be large , but it doesn ’ t have any storage space .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The master suite is supposed to be quite elegant . Maybe it will be a little better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many dogs live in this house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that we have seen all that we need to see here . Let ’ s go look at another house .
segments.speaker: S2
